definition: (of a perfume or a foul odor) permeating the whole place/(of grease etc) dripping everywhere/flowing all over the place
four/4
to overflow/(literary) excessive/old variant of 鎰|镒[yi4]

sentences.chinese: 鱼饵香气四溢，味道鲜美。

sentences.english: Steams the glutinous food, ten fragrant four overflow.
sentences.chinese: 一家蒸糯饭，十家香四溢。

sentences.english: The planet Jupiter blazes near the waxing gibbous moon tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚光辉四溢的木星和月亮拉近了距离。

sentences.english: Wheat field is full of fragrance overflowing to wheat straw.
sentences.chinese: 麦场上到处是清香四溢地麦秸。

sentences.english: After the rain is fine, Lotus overflowing, success and fame only in overnight.
sentences.chinese: 雨过是天晴，荷香四溢，成功与英名只在朝夕间。

sentences.english: Outside there is a layer of powdery white mold, cut after the bright red and dripping, scented.
sentences.chinese: 外面有一层粉状的白霉，切开后嫣红欲滴，香气四溢。

sentences.english: Every mid-summer, the wild crabapple blossoms filled valley, fragrance overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 每逢仲夏时节，野生海棠花开满沟谷，清香四溢。

sentences.english: Every mid-summer, full of wild crabapple valley, fragrance overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 每逢仲夏时节，野生海棠开满沟谷，清香四溢。

sentences.english: The air freshener furnishes you with fine aromatic surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 空气清香剂为您创造一个芳香四溢的美好环境。

sentences.english: She hugged me, passionately effusive as always.
sentences.chinese: 她紧紧地拥抱了我，还是像往常一样热情四溢。
鸭舌20只，酱香味，香浓四溢。

sentences.english: Even if the fervor four overflows, even if enriches bustles about, when the things quiet down, lives alone.
sentences.chinese: 即使激情四溢，即使充实忙碌，曲终人散，独处时。

sentences.english: Only the actions of the just smell sweet , and blossom in their dust.
sentences.chinese: 惟有正义者的行动芳香四溢，并在尘土中吐艳。

sentences.english: As the perfumed tincture of the roses.
sentences.chinese: 比起玫瑰的芳馥四溢的姣颜。

sentences.english: Her garden was most fragrance in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 她家的花园到了春天芬芳四溢。

sentences.english: The wild rose-briar is sweet in spring
sentences.chinese: 野玫瑰在春天和夏天开花，花香四溢。

definition: to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
to radiate all around
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
variant of 彌漫|弥漫[mi2 man4]
to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
to be full to overflowing/to be brimming over with
steaming/scathing
(of droplets, sparks etc) to fly about in all directions/to splatter everywhere
to curl up/to linger on (sound)
dense (of smoke, mist)
(of a vapor etc) to rise/to hang in the air
overflowing
lit. sth hits one in the face/directly in one's face/sth assaults the senses/blatant (advertising)/eye-catching/(a smell) assaults the nostrils
to spill out
to waft (through the air)/to drift
to overflow/to be brimming over
strongly fragrant/heavily scented
